sentence.Network_en: The Government has introduced a number of other money-saving moves.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府已经采取了其他一些省钱的举措。

sentence.Network_en: Try to get into the habit of saving your work regularly.
sentence.Network_cn: 要努力养成经常将工作内容存盘的习惯。

sentence.Network_en: She decided her child should go to America for life-saving treatment.
sentence.Network_cn: 她决定把孩子送到美国去接受可能挽救生命的治疗。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from save; the preposition probably from save, on the pattern of touching

entry.def: A saving is a reduction in the amount of time or money that is used or needed.

example.ex: Fill in the form below and you will be making a saving of £6.60 on a one-year subscription.
example.tran: 填写以下表格，全年订阅即可为您节省 6.60英镑。

example.ex: ...a program of household savings on energy use.

entry.tran: (尤指在银行和购屋互助协会的)储蓄款，存款;积蓄
entry.def: Your savings are the money that you have saved, especially in a bank or a building society.

example.ex: Her savings were in the Post Office Savings Bank.
example.tran: 她的钱存在邮政储蓄银行里。

means.word_mean: 1. an act of economizing; reduction in cost;

sentences.sentence: "it was a small economy to walk to work every day"

means.word_mean: 2. recovery or preservation from loss or danger;

sentences.sentence: "a surgeon's job is the saving of lives"

means.word_mean: 3. the activity of protecting something from loss or danger
1. bringing about salvation or redemption from sin;

sentences.sentence: "wealthy by inheritance but saving by constitution"- Ellen Glasgow

auth_sentence.res_content: But the union says it is about saving money.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the union says it is about saving money.

auth_sentence.content: That rise in saving has depressed domestic economic activity.
auth_sentence.res_content: That rise in saving has depressed domestic economic activity.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =save,表示"救助"; 2. 完全的，安全的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 存款, 挽救, 救助
stems_affixes.word_buile: sav=save救助+ing状态→n.存款, 挽救, 救助
save救助→v.救,拯救;储蓄,贮存;节省

Sentence.sentence: Some businesses will benefit but the vast bulk of the savings will be captured by workers, not their employers.
They also calculated the cost savings emerging from the amount of disease that would be avoided because of lower blood pressure
The rest of the energy savings comes from the solar units.
Amid the current concerns about the federal deficit, reaching toward the stars seems a dispensable luxury—as if saving one-thousandth of a single year's budget would solve our problems.
A number of innovative colleges are making the same offer to students anxious about saving time and money.
Those who keep saving will live an easy life in the end

sentences.en: It will be a saving to take a short cut.
We can make big savings on fuel through greater efficiency.
sentences.cn: 我们可通过提高效率大量节省燃料。

sentences.en: Bob took his savings out of the bank to buy a bicycle.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃从银行取出存款去买自行车。

sentences.en: They have thought out the effective saving.
sentences.cn: 他们已想出挽救的办法。
